Properties.ProtectedString:
--Made by Luckymaxer
Tool = script.Parent Handle = Tool:WaitForChild("Handle")
Players = game:GetService("Players") ContentProvider = game:GetService("ContentProvider")
Camera = game:GetService("Workspace").CurrentCamera
Animations = {}
ServerControl = Tool:WaitForChild("ServerControl") ClientControl = Tool:WaitForChild("ClientControl")
ClientControl.OnClientInvoke = (function(Mode, Value) if Mode == "PlayAnimation" and Humanoid then for i, v in pairs(Animations) do if v.Animation == Value.Animation then v.AnimationTrack:Stop() table.remove(Animations, i) end end local AnimationTrack = Humanoid:LoadAnimation(Value.Animation) table.insert(Animations, {Animation = Value.Animation, AnimationTrack = AnimationTrack}) AnimationTrack:Play(Value.FadeTime, Value.Weight, Value.Speed) elseif Mode == "StopAnimation" and Value then for i, v in pairs(Animations) do if v.Animation == Value.Animation then v.AnimationTrack:Stop() table.remove(Animations, i) end end elseif Mode == "Preload" and Value then ContentProvider:Preload(Value) elseif Mode == "PlaySound" and Value then Value:Play() elseif Mode == "StopSound" and Value then Value:Stop() elseif Mode == "MousePosition" then return PlayerMouse.Hit.p elseif Mode == "DisableJump" then DisableJump(Value) end end)
function InvokeServer(Mode, Value) pcall(function() local ServerReturn = ServerControl:InvokeServer(Mode, Value) return ServerReturn end) end
function DisableJump(Boolean) if PreventJump then PreventJump:disconnect() end if Boolean then PreventJump = Humanoid.Changed:connect(function(Property) if Property == "Jump" then Humanoid.Jump = false end end) end end
function CheckIfAlive() return (Player and Player.Parent and Humanoid and Humanoid.Parent and Humanoid.Health > 0) end
function Equipped(Mouse) Character = Tool.Parent Player = Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Character) Humanoid = Character:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if not CheckIfAlive() then return end PlayerMouse = Player:GetMouse() Mouse.Button1Down:connect(function() InvokeServer("MouseClick", {Down = true}) end) Mouse.KeyDown:connect(function(Key) InvokeServer("KeyPress", {Key = Key, Down = true}) end) Mouse.KeyUp:connect(function(Key) InvokeServer("KeyPress", {Key = Key, Down = false}) end) end
function Unequipped() for i, v in pairs(Animations) do if v and v.AnimationTrack then v.AnimationTrack:Stop() end end if PreventJump then PreventJump:disconnect() end Animations = {} end
Tool.Equipped:connect(Equipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(Unequipped)

--Made by Luckymaxer
Mouse_Icon = "rbxasset://textures/GunCursor.png" Reloading_Icon = "rbxasset://textures/GunWaitCursor.png"
Tool = script.Parent
Mouse = nil
function UpdateIcon() if Mouse then Mouse.Icon = Tool.Enabled and Mouse_Icon or Reloading_Icon end end
function OnEquipped(ToolMouse) Mouse = ToolMouse UpdateIcon() end
function OnChanged(Property) if Property == "Enabled" then UpdateIcon() end end
Tool.Equipped:connect(OnEquipped) Tool.Changed:connect(OnChanged)

--Made by Luckymaxer
Tool = script.Parent Handle = Tool:WaitForChild("Handle")
Players = game:GetService("Players") Debris = game:GetService("Debris")
FrightenScript = script:WaitForChild("FrightenScript")
BasePart = Instance.new("Part") BasePart.Shape = Enum.PartType.Block BasePart.Material = Enum.Material.Plastic BasePart.TopSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth BasePart.BottomSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth BasePart.FormFactor = Enum.FormFactor.Custom BasePart.Size = Vector3.new(0.2, 0.2, 0.2) BasePart.CanCollide = true BasePart.Locked = true BasePart.Anchored = false
Animations = { }
Sounds = { BatScreech = Handle:WaitForChild("BatScreech"), GhostScream = Handle:WaitForChild("GhostScream"), PumpkinSplat = Handle:WaitForChild("PumpkinSplat"), Launch = Handle:WaitForChild("Launch") }
Objects = { Pumpkins = { { Size = Vector3.new(0.75, 0.9, 0.75), MeshId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=64490321", TextureId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=64490105", Scale = Vector3.new(0.75, 0.75, 0.75), VertexColor = Vector3.new(1, 1, 1) }, { Size = Vector3.new(1, 0.9, 1), MeshId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=37223756", TextureId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=37223746", Scale = Vector3.new(0.75, 0.75, 0.8), VertexColor = Vector3.new(1, 1, 1) }, { Size = Vector3.new(1, 0.8, 1), MeshId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=37223787", TextureId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=37223779", Scale = Vector3.new(1, 1, 1), VertexColor = Vector3.new(1, 1, 1) }, { Size = Vector3.new(0.8, 0.6, 0.9), MeshId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=16435900", TextureId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=16435893", Scale = Vector3.new(0.5, 0.5, 0.5), VertexColor = Vector3.new(1, 1, 1) } }, Ghosts = { { Size = Vector3.new(1.25, 1.5, 0.5), MeshId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=64445076", TextureId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=64445059", Scale = Vector3.new(0.5, 0.5, 0.5), VertexColor = Vector3.new(1, 1, 1) }, { Size = Vector3.new(2, 1.25, 0.5), MeshId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=89391602", TextureId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=89391636", Scale = Vector3.new(0.25, 0.25, 0.25), VertexColor = Vector3.new(0.8, 1, 0.8) }, { Size = Vector3.new(0.75, 1.5, 0.75), MeshId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=179124206", TextureId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=179124246", Scale = Vector3.new(0.25, 0.25, 0.25), VertexColor = Vector3.new(0.8, 1, 0.8) } }, Bats = { { Size = Vector3.new(2.75, 0.5, 1), MeshId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset?id=178495237", TextureId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset?id=178495266", Scale = Vector3.new(1, 1, 1), VertexColor = Vector3.new(1, 1, 1) } }, }
PumpkinSplatterImages = { 183686598, 183686615, 183686632, 183686647, 183686670 }
Equipped = false
Gravity = 196.20
ReloadTime = 3 RetractTime = 1
ServerControl = (Tool:FindFirstChild("ServerControl") or Instance.new("RemoteFunction")) ServerControl.Name = "ServerControl" ServerControl.Parent = Tool
ClientControl = (Tool:FindFirstChild("ClientControl") or Instance.new("RemoteFunction")) ClientControl.Name = "ClientControl" ClientControl.Parent = Tool
Tool.Enabled = true
ServerControl.OnServerInvoke = (function(player, Mode, Value) if player == Player then if Mode == "MouseClick" and Value.Down then Activated() elseif Mode == "KeyPress" then local Key = Value.Key local ByteKey = string.byte(Key) local Down = Value.Down end end end)
function InvokeClient(Mode, Value) local ClientReturn = nil pcall(function() ClientReturn = ClientControl:InvokeClient(Player, Mode, Value) end) return ClientReturn end
function TagHumanoid(humanoid, player) local Creator_Tag = Instance.new("ObjectValue") Creator_Tag.Name = "creator" Creator_Tag.Value = player Debris:AddItem(Creator_Tag, 2) Creator_Tag.Parent = humanoid end
function UntagHumanoid(humanoid) for i, v in pairs(humanoid:GetChildren()) do if v:IsA("ObjectValue") and v.Name == "creator" then v:Destroy() end end end
function CoverScreen(player) local PlayerGui = player:FindFirstChild("PlayerGui") if PlayerGui then local ScreenGui = Instance.new("ScreenGui") ScreenGui.Name = "WatermelonSplatter" local MainFrame = Instance.new("Frame") MainFrame.Name = "Splater" MainFrame.Position = UDim2.new(0, 0, 0, 0) MainFrame.Size = UDim2.new(1, 0, 1, 0) MainFrame.BackgroundColor = BrickColor.new(1, 1, 1) MainFrame.Transparency = 1 MainFrame.BorderColor = BrickColor.new(1, 1, 1) MainFrame.Parent = ScreenGui
local s = Instance.new("ImageLabel") local size = ((math.random() * 0.2) + 0.5) s.Size = UDim2.new(size, 0, size, 0) s.Position = UDim2.new((math.random() - (size / 2)), 0, (math.random() - (size / 2)),0) s.SizeConstraint = Enum.SizeConstraint.RelativeXX s.Transparency = 1 s.Image = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=" .. PumpkinSplatterImages[math.random(1, #PumpkinSplatterImages)] s.Parent = MainFrame
Debris:AddItem(s, (5 + (math.random() * 2)))
for i = 1, 20 do local s = Instance.new("ImageLabel") local size = ((math.random() * 0.05) + 0.05) s.Size = UDim2.new(size,0, size, 0) s.Position = UDim2.new((math.random() - (size / 2)), 0, (math.random() - (size / 2)), 0) s.SizeConstraint = Enum.SizeConstraint.RelativeXX s.Transparency = 1 s.Image = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=" .. PumpkinSplatterImages[math.random(1, #PumpkinSplatterImages)] s.Parent = MainFrame Debris:AddItem(s, (3 + (math.random() * 6))) end
Debris:AddItem(ScreenGui, 10)
ScreenGui.Parent = PlayerGui
end end
function CreateAmmo() if AmmoPart and AmmoPart.Parent then AmmoPart:Destroy() end local Indexes = {} for i, v in pairs(Objects) do table.insert(Indexes, i) end local RandomIndex = Indexes[math.random(1, #Indexes)] local AmmoType = Objects[RandomIndex] local AmmoChosen = AmmoType[math.random(1, #AmmoType)] AmmoPart = BasePart:Clone() AmmoPart.Name = "LauncherAmmo" AmmoPart.Size = AmmoChosen.Size local AmmoMesh = Instance.new("SpecialMesh") AmmoMesh.MeshType = Enum.MeshType.FileMesh AmmoMesh.MeshId = AmmoChosen.MeshId AmmoMesh.TextureId = AmmoChosen.TextureId AmmoMesh.Scale = AmmoChosen.Scale AmmoMesh.VertexColor = AmmoChosen.VertexColor AmmoMesh.Parent = AmmoPart local AmmoWeld = Instance.new("Weld") AmmoWeld.Name = "AmmoWeld" AmmoWeld.Part0 = SkeletonHand AmmoWeld.Part1 = AmmoPart AmmoWeld.C0 = CFrame.new(0, ((SkeletonHand.Size.Y / 2) + (AmmoPart.Size.Y / 2) - (SkeletonHand.Size.Y / 2) - 0.05), ((SkeletonHand.Size.Z / 2) + (AmmoPart.Size.Z / 2) - AmmoPart.Size.Z)) AmmoWeld.Parent = AmmoPart if Equipped then AmmoPart.Parent = Tool end return {Part = AmmoPart, Type = AmmoType}, AmmoWeld end
function GetAmmo() AmmoPart, AmmoWeld = CreateAmmo() end
function CreateCoffinWithHand() local Coffin = BasePart:Clone() Coffin.Name = "Coffin" Coffin.Size = Vector3.new(1.25, 1.125, 2.75) Coffin.CanCollide = false local CoffinMesh = Instance.new("SpecialMesh") CoffinMesh.MeshType = Enum.MeshType.FileMesh CoffinMesh.MeshId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset?id=178527856" CoffinMesh.TextureId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset?id=178528380" CoffinMesh.Scale = Vector3.new(1, 1, 1) CoffinMesh.Parent = Coffin
local ConnectorPart = BasePart:Clone() ConnectorPart.Name = "ConnnectorPart" ConnectorPart.Transparency = 1 ConnectorPart.Size = Vector3.new(0.2, 0.2, 0.2) ConnectorPart.CanCollide = false
local SkeletonHand = BasePart:Clone() SkeletonHand.Name = "SkeletonHand" SkeletonHand.Size = Vector3.new(1.25, 0.25, 2.5) SkeletonHand.CanCollide = false local SkeletonHandMesh = Instance.new("SpecialMesh") SkeletonHandMesh.MeshType = Enum.MeshType.FileMesh SkeletonHandMesh.MeshId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset?id=178527811" SkeletonHandMesh.TextureId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset?id=178528380" SkeletonHandMesh.Scale = Vector3.new(1, 1, 1) SkeletonHandMesh.Parent = SkeletonHand
local CoffinWeld = Instance.new("Weld") CoffinWeld.Name = "CoffinWeld" CoffinWeld.Part0 = Handle CoffinWeld.Part1 = Coffin CoffinWeld.C0 = CFrame.new(0, 0, 0) CoffinWeld.C1 = CFrame.new(0, 0.1, 0.025) CoffinWeld.Parent = Coffin
local ConnectorWeld = Instance.new("Weld") ConnectorWeld.Name = "ConnectorWeld" ConnectorWeld.Part0 = Coffin ConnectorWeld.Part1 = ConnectorPart ConnectorWeld.C0 = CFrame.new(0, 0.5375, -0.9) ConnectorWeld.Parent = Coffin
local SkeletonHandMotor = Instance.new("Motor6D") SkeletonHandMotor.Name = "SkeletonHandMotor" SkeletonHandMotor.Part0 = ConnectorPart SkeletonHandMotor.Part1 = SkeletonHand SkeletonHandMotor.C0 = CFrame.new(-0.0125, 0, 0) * CFrame.Angles(0, -(math.pi / 2), 0) SkeletonHandMotor.C1 = CFrame.new(-0.025, -0.1, -1.13) * CFrame.Angles(0, -(math.pi / 2), 0) SkeletonHandMotor.MaxVelocity = 0.1 SkeletonHandMotor.Parent = Coffin
Coffin.Parent = Tool ConnectorPart.Parent = Tool SkeletonHand.Parent = Tool
return Coffin, ConnectorPart, SkeletonHand, SkeletonHandMotor
end
function CheckIfAlive() return (Player and Player.Parent and Character and Character.Parent and Humanoid and Humanoid.Parent and Humanoid.Health > 0) end
function Activated() if not Tool.Enabled or not CheckIfAlive() then return end Tool.Enabled = false SkeletonHandMotor.DesiredAngle = 1 Sounds.Launch:Play() if AmmoPart and AmmoPart.Part.Parent and AmmoWeld and AmmoWeld.Parent then local CurrentCharacter = Character local CurrentAmmo = AmmoPart.Part local CurrentType = AmmoPart.Type local FirstHit = false CurrentAmmo.Touched:connect(function(Hit) if not Hit or not Hit.Parent then return end local character = Hit.Parent if character:IsA("Tool") or character:IsA("Hat") then character = character.Parent end if character == CurrentCharacter then return end if CurrentType == Objects.Pumpkins and not FirstHit then FirstHit = true if CurrentAmmo and CurrentAmmo.Parent then local Sound = Sounds.PumpkinSplat:Clone() Sound.Parent = CurrentAmmo Sound:Play() local AmmoCFrame = CurrentAmmo.CFrame if CurrentAmmo and CurrentAmmo.Parent then CurrentAmmo:Destroy() end local Radius = 2 local Radius = (Radius * 10) local TouchConnections = {} for i = 1, 50 do local Splatter = Instance.new("Part") Splatter.Name = "PumpkinSplatter" Splatter.BrickColor = BrickColor.new("Br. yellowish orange") Splatter.Material = Enum.Material.Plastic Splatter.Shape = Enum.PartType.Block Splatter.FormFactor = Enum.FormFactor.Custom Splatter.TopSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth Splatter.BottomSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth Splatter.Size = Vector3.new(0.2, 0.2, 0.2) Splatter.CanCollide = true local BlockMesh = Instance.new("BlockMesh") BlockMesh.Parent = Splatter Debris:AddItem(Splatter, 2) local SplatterHit = Splatter.Touched:connect(function(Hit2) if not Hit2 or not Hit2.Parent then return end local character2 = Hit2.Parent if character2:IsA("Tool") or character:IsA("Hat") then character2 = character.Parent end if character2 == CurrentCharacter then return end local humanoid = character2:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if humanoid and humanoid.Health > 0 then local player = Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(character2) if player then CoverScreen(player) end end end) table.insert(TouchConnections, SplatterHit) Splatter.Parent = game:GetService("Workspace") Splatter.CFrame = AmmoCFrame + Vector3.new((math.random(Radius, Radius) / 100), (math.random(Radius, Radius) / 100), (math.random(Radius, Radius) / 100)) Splatter.Velocity = Vector3.new((math.random(-1, 1) * math.random(5, 25)), (math.random(-1, 1) * math.random(5, 25)), (math.random(-1, 1) * math.random(5, 25))) end Delay(0.5, function() for i, v in pairs(TouchConnections) do if v then v:disconnect() end end end) local humanoid = character:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if humanoid and humanoid.Health > 0 then end end elseif CurrentType == Objects.Ghosts then local humanoid = character:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if humanoid and humanoid.Health > 0 then FirstHit = true CurrentAmmo.Anchored = true local Mesh = CurrentAmmo:FindFirstChild("Mesh") if Mesh then local Sound = Sounds.GhostScream:Clone() Sound.Parent = CurrentAmmo Sound:Play() local OriginalScale = Mesh.Scale if not character:FindFirstChild(FrightenScript.Name) then local FrightenScriptClone = FrightenScript:Clone() FrightenScriptClone.Disabled = false FrightenScriptClone.Parent = character end for i = 1, 25 do if CurrentAmmo and CurrentAmmo.Parent then Mesh.Scale = (OriginalScale + (Vector3.new(0.01, 0.01, 0.01) * i)) wait(0.01) end end end end elseif CurrentType == Objects.Bats then local humanoid = character:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if humanoid and humanoid.Health > 0 then FirstHit = true if CurrentAmmo and CurrentAmmo.Parent then CurrentAmmo:Destroy() end UntagHumanoid(humanoid) TagHumanoid(humanoid, Player) humanoid:TakeDamage(25) end end end) CurrentAmmo.Parent = game:GetService("Workspace") Debris:AddItem(CurrentAmmo, 5)
local TargetPosition = InvokeClient("MousePosition", nil)
AmmoWeld:Destroy()
if CurrentType == Objects.Pumpkins then local Direction = (TargetPosition - CurrentAmmo.Position) Direction = Direction - Direction.unit * 5
local DeltaXZSquared = (Direction.X * Direction.X + Direction.Z * Direction.Z) local DeltaXZ = math.sqrt(DeltaXZSquared) local DeltaY = Direction.Y local Alpha = (math.random() * math.pi / 4 + math.pi / 8) local Numerator = (-0.5 * Gravity * DeltaXZSquared) local Denominator = (math.cos(Alpha) * math.cos(Alpha) * (DeltaY - math.tan(Alpha) * DeltaXZ)) if Denominator == 0 then return end local MissileSpeed = math.sqrt(Numerator / Denominator) if MissileSpeed > 80 then MissileSpeed = 80 end local VectorXZ = (MissileSpeed * math.cos(Alpha)) local VectorY = (MissileSpeed * math.sin(Alpha)) local VectorX = (VectorXZ * Direction.X / DeltaXZ) local VectorZ = (VectorXZ * Direction.Z / DeltaXZ) CurrentAmmo.Velocity = Vector3.new(VectorX, VectorY, VectorZ) elseif CurrentType == Objects.Ghosts then CurrentAmmo.CanCollide = false local FlightSpeed = 50 local Direction = CFrame.new(CurrentAmmo.Position, TargetPosition) local Mass = (CurrentAmmo:GetMass() * Gravity) CurrentAmmo.CFrame = Direction local BodyVelocity = Instance.new("BodyVelocity") BodyVelocity.maxForce = Vector3.new(Mass, Mass, Mass) BodyVelocity.velocity = Direction.lookVector * FlightSpeed BodyVelocity.Parent = CurrentAmmo CurrentAmmo.Velocity = BodyVelocity.velocity elseif CurrentType == Objects.Bats then local Sound = Sounds.BatScreech:Clone() Sound.Parent = CurrentAmmo Sound:Play() CurrentAmmo.CanCollide = true local FlightSpeed = 100 local Direction = CFrame.new(CurrentAmmo.Position, TargetPosition) local Mass = (CurrentAmmo:GetMass() * Gravity) CurrentAmmo.CFrame = Direction local BodyVelocity = Instance.new("BodyVelocity") BodyVelocity.maxForce = Vector3.new(Mass, Mass, Mass) BodyVelocity.velocity = Direction.lookVector * FlightSpeed BodyVelocity.Parent = CurrentAmmo local BodyGyro = Instance.new("BodyGyro") BodyGyro.maxTorque = Vector3.new(math.huge, math.huge, math.huge) BodyGyro.cframe = Direction BodyGyro.Parent = CurrentAmmo CurrentAmmo.Velocity = BodyVelocity.velocity end
end AmmoPart = nil AmmoWeld = nil wait(RetractTime) SkeletonHandMotor.DesiredAngle = 0 wait(ReloadTime) GetAmmo() Tool.Enabled = true end
function Equipped() Character = Tool.Parent Player = Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Character) Humanoid = Character:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if not CheckIfAlive() then return end Equipped = true Handle.Transparency = 1 Spawn(function() Coffin, ConnectorPart, SkeletonHand, SkeletonHandMotor = CreateCoffinWithHand() if Tool.Enabled then if not AmmoPart or not AmmoWeld then GetAmmo() else AmmoWeld.Part0 = SkeletonHand AmmoWeld.Part1 = AmmoPart.Part AmmoWeld.Parent = AmmoPart.Part AmmoPart.Part.Parent = Tool end end end) end
function Unequipped() if not Equipped then return end Equipped = false for i, v in pairs({SkeletonHand, ConnectorPart, Coffin}) do if v and v.Parent then v:Destroy() end end if AmmoPart and AmmoPart.Part.Parent and AmmoWeld then AmmoWeld.Parent = nil AmmoPart.Part.Parent = nil else AmmoPart = nil AmmoWeld = nil end Handle.Transparency = 0 for i, v in pairs(Animations) do InvokeClient("StopAnimation", v) end end
Tool.Equipped:connect(Equipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(Unequipped)

--Made by Luckymaxer
Character = script.Parent
JumpScare = script:WaitForChild("JumpScare") FrightenedCoverFace = script:WaitForChild("FrightenedCoverFace")
Debris = game:GetService("Debris")
function DestroyScript() Debris:AddItem(script, 2) end
Humanoid = Character:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if not JumpScare or not FrightenedCoverFace or not Humanoid then DestroyScript() end
local JumpScareAnim = Humanoid:LoadAnimation(JumpScare) if JumpScareAnim then DisableJump = Humanoid.Changed:connect(function(Property) if Property == "Jump" then Humanoid.Jump = false end end) Humanoid.WalkSpeed = 0 JumpScareAnim:Play(nil, nil, 2) wait(1) local FrightenedCoverFaceAnim = Humanoid:LoadAnimation(FrightenedCoverFace) if FrightenedCoverFaceAnim then FrightenedCoverFaceAnim:Play() wait(5) if FrightenedCoverFaceAnim then FrightenedCoverFaceAnim:Stop() if DisableJump then DisableJump:disconnect() end Humanoid.WalkSpeed = 16 DestroyScript() end end end
